##Holbrook paper

Looks at advancements in the derivatives markets

open contract conecpt - futures markets are measured in terms of volume of contracts outstanding

hedging market concept - derivatives used to be used for speculation but now is more for hedging

multipurpose concept of hedging - have been used to hedge risk including substitute for merchandising contracts

price of storage concept - spot prices are affected by future expected supply

Concept of Reliably Anticipatory Prices - futures prices are very good estimates based on current information on future supply and demand

market balance concept - futures prices that are higher as they get closer to delivery are not normally present
